description: The dual-SIM device Samsung Galaxy M10s runs on Android 9.0 Pie and sports a 6.4-inch HD+ (720×1520 pixels) Infinity V Display with a 19:9 aspect ratio. The device is powered by an Exynos 7885 1.8 GHz 14 nm Octa-core processor, coupled with 3GB of RAM and 32GB of inbuilt storage which is expandable up to 1TB via microSD card. The Galaxy M10s features a dual-camera setup at the rear, comprised of a 13-megapixel main sensor with an f/1.9 aperture, an 8-megapixel secondary sensor with an f/2.0 aperture and also comes with the Live Focus feature. The second camera enables 120-degree ultra-wide-angle photography and can be selected through the camera app on the smartphone. Just fire up the 8MP Front Camera for lit selfies on your social feed with the In-Display Flash, selfie focus mode and f/2.0 aperture. The amazing M10s is available in two different colors Ocean Blue, Charcoal Black. This device is unstoppable with 4000 mAh battery under the hood and has an accelerometer, compass, proximity sensor, virtual light sensor alongside Fast Face Unlock feature to unlock your phone quickly.
